00051 void SetFactTrue( UINT16 usFact )
00052 {
00053       // This function is here just for control flow purposes (debug breakpoints)
00054       // and code is more readable that way
00055 
00056       // must intercept when Jake is first trigered to start selling fuel
00057       if ( ( usFact == FACT_ESTONI_REFUELLING_POSSIBLE ) && ( CheckFact( usFact, 0 ) == FALSE ) )
00058       {
00059             // give him some gas...
00060             GuaranteeAtLeastXItemsOfIndex( ARMS_DEALER_JAKE, GAS_CAN, ( UINT8 ) ( 4 + Random( 3 ) ) );
00061       }
00062 
00063       gubFact[usFact] = TRUE;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void SetFactFalse( UINT16 usFact )
00067 {
00068       gubFact[usFact] = FALSE;
00069 }

00071 BOOLEAN CheckForNewShipment( void )
00072 {
00073       ITEM_POOL *             pItemPool;
00074 
00075       if ( ( gWorldSectorX == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_X ) && ( gWorldSectorY == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Y ) && ( gbWorldSectorZ == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Z ) )  
00076       {
00077             if ( GetItemPool( BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_GRIDNO, &pItemPool, 0 ) )
00078             {
00079                   return( !( ITEMPOOL_VISIBLE( pItemPool ) ) );
00080             }
00081       }
00082       return( FALSE );
00083 }

00085 BOOLEAN CheckNPCWounded( UINT8 ubProfileID, BOOLEAN fByPlayerOnly )
00086 {
00087       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00088 
00089       // is the NPC is wounded at all?
00090       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileID, FALSE );
00091       if (pSoldier && pSoldier->bLife < pSoldier->bLifeMax)
00092       {
00093             if (fByPlayerOnly)
00094             {
00095                   if (gMercProfiles[ubProfileID].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_WOUNDEDBYPLAYER)
00096                   {
00097                         return( TRUE );
00098                   }
00099                   else
00100                   {
00101                         return( FALSE );
00102                   }
00103             }                 
00104             else
00105             {
00106                   return( TRUE );
00107             }
00108       }
00109       else
00110       {
00111             return( FALSE );
00112             
00113       }
00114 }

00149 BOOLEAN CheckNPCWithin( UINT8 ubFirstNPC, UINT8 ubSecondNPC, UINT8 ubMaxDistance )
00150 {
00151       SOLDIERTYPE * pFirstNPC, * pSecondNPC;
00152 
00153       pFirstNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubFirstNPC, FALSE );
00154       pSecondNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubSecondNPC, FALSE );
00155       if (!pFirstNPC || !pSecondNPC)
00156       {
00157             return( FALSE );
00158       }
00159       return( PythSpacesAway( pFirstNPC->sGridNo, pSecondNPC->sGridNo ) <= ubMaxDistance );

00195 BOOLEAN CheckNPCIsEnemy( UINT8 ubProfileID )
00196 {
00197       SOLDIERTYPE * pNPC;
00198 
00199       pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileID, FALSE );
00200       if (!pNPC)
00201       {
00202             return( FALSE );
00203       }
00204       if (pNPC->bSide == gbPlayerNum || pNPC->bNeutral)
00205       {
00206             if (pNPC->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP)
00207             {
00208                   // although the soldier is NOW the same side, this civ group could be set to "will become hostile"
00209                   return( gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pNPC->ubCivilianGroup ] >= CIV_GROUP_WILL_BECOME_HOSTILE );
00210             }
00211             else
00212             {
00213                   return( FALSE );
00214             }
00215       }
00216       else
00217       {
00218             return( TRUE );
00219       }
00220 }

00222 BOOLEAN CheckIfMercIsNearNPC( SOLDIERTYPE *pMerc, UINT8 ubProfileId )
00223 {
00224       SOLDIERTYPE *           pNPC;
00225       INT16                               sGridNo;
00226 
00227       // no merc nearby?
00228       if ( pMerc == NULL )
00229       {
00230             return( FALSE );
00231       }
00232 
00233       pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileId, FALSE );
00234       if ( pNPC == NULL )
00235       {
00236             return( FALSE );
00237       }
00238       sGridNo = pNPC->sGridNo;
00239 
00240       // is the merc and NPC close enough?
00241       if (PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pMerc->sGridNo ) <= 9)
00242       {
00243             return( TRUE );
00244       }
00245 
00246       return( FALSE );
00247 }

00250 INT8 NumWoundedMercsNearby( UINT8 ubProfileID )
00251 {
00252       INT8                                bNumber = 0;
00253       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00254       SOLDIERTYPE *           pNPC;
00255       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00256       INT16                               sGridNo;
00257 
00258       pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileID, FALSE );
00259       if (!pNPC)
00260       {
00261             return( FALSE );
00262       }
00263       sGridNo = pNPC->sGridNo;
00264 
00265       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00266       {
00267             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00268 
00269             if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && pSoldier->bLife < pSoldier->bLifeMax && pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL )
00270             {
00271                   if (PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) <= HOSPITAL_PATIENT_DISTANCE)
00272                   {
00273                         bNumber++;
00274                   }
00275             }
00276       }
00277 
00278       return( bNumber );
00279 }

00353 BOOLEAN PCInSameRoom( UINT8 ubProfileID )
00354 {
00355       SOLDIERTYPE *           pNPC;
00356       UINT8                               ubRoom;
00357       INT8        bLoop;
00358       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00359 
00360       pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileID, FALSE );
00361       if ( !pNPC )
00362       {
00363             return( FALSE );
00364       }
00365       ubRoom = gubWorldRoomInfo[ pNPC->sGridNo ];
00366 
00367       for ( bLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; bLoop++ )
00368       {
00369             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ bLoop ];
00370             if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
00371             {
00372                   if ( gubWorldRoomInfo[ pSoldier->sGridNo ] == ubRoom )
00373                   {
00374                         return( TRUE );
00375                   }
00376             }
00377       }
00378       
00379       return( FALSE );
00380 }

00383 BOOLEAN CheckTalkerStrong( void )
00384 {
00385       if (gpSrcSoldier && gpSrcSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
00386       {
00387             return( gpSrcSoldier->bStrength >= 84 );
00388       }
00389       else if (gpDestSoldier && gpDestSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
00390       {
00391             return( gpDestSoldier->bStrength >= 84 );
00392       }
00393       return( FALSE );
00394 }

00397 {

00404             return( gMercProfiles[ gpDestSoldier->ubProfile ].bSex == FEMALE );

00428 INT8 NumMalesPresent( UINT8 ubProfileID )
00429 {
00430       INT8                                bNumber = 0;
00431       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00432       SOLDIERTYPE *           pNPC;
00433       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00434       INT16                               sGridNo;
00435 
00436       pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileID, FALSE );
00437       if (!pNPC)
00438       {
00439             return( FALSE );
00440       }
00441       sGridNo = pNPC->sGridNo;
00442 
00443       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00444       {
00445             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00446 
00447             if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE)
00448             {
00449                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile].bSex == MALE )
00450                   {
00451                         if (PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) <= 8)
00452                         {
00453                               bNumber++;
00454                         }
00455                   }
00456             }
00457       }
00458 
00459       return( bNumber );
00460 }

00519 BOOLEAN CheckNPCSector( UINT8 ubProfileID, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
00520 {
00521       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00522 
00523       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfileID, TRUE );
00524 
00525       if( pSoldier )
00526       {
00527             if (pSoldier->sSectorX == sSectorX &&
00528                   pSoldier->sSectorY == sSectorY &&
00529                   pSoldier->bSectorZ == bSectorZ )
00530             {
00531                   return( TRUE );
00532             }
00533       }
00534       else if (gMercProfiles[ubProfileID].sSectorX == sSectorX &&
00535             gMercProfiles[ubProfileID].sSectorY == sSectorY &&
00536             gMercProfiles[ubProfileID].bSectorZ == bSectorZ )
00537       {
00538             return( TRUE );
00539       }
00540 
00541       return( FALSE );
00542 
00543 }

00545 BOOLEAN AIMMercWithin( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sDistance )
00546 {
00547       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00548       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00549 
00550       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00551       {
00552             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00553 
00554             if ( pSoldier && (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) && ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC ) )
00555             {
00556                   if (PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) <= sDistance)
00557                   {
00558                         return( TRUE );
00559                   }
00560             }
00561       }
00562 
00563       return( FALSE );
00564 }

00617 BOOLEAN InTownSectorWithTrainingLoyalty( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
00618 {
00619       UINT8 ubTown;
00620       INT32 iMinLoyaltyToTrain = gGameExternalOptions.iMinLoyaltyToTrain;
00621 DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"Quests");
00622 
00623       ubTown = GetTownIdForSector( sSectorX, sSectorY );
00624       if ( ( ubTown != BLANK_SECTOR ) && gTownLoyalty[ ubTown ].fStarted && gfTownUsesLoyalty[ ubTown ])
00625       {
00626             return( gTownLoyalty[ ubTown ].ubRating >= iMinLoyaltyToTrain );
00627       }
00628       else
00629       {
00630             return( FALSE );
00631       }
00632 }

00634 BOOLEAN CheckFact( UINT16 usFact, UINT8 ubProfileID )
00635 {
00636       INT8 bTown = -1;
00637 
00638 
00639       switch( usFact )
00640       {
00641             case FACT_DIMITRI_DEAD:
00642                   gubFact[ usFact ] = (gMercProfiles[ DIMITRI ].bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD );
00643                   break;
00644             case FACT_CURRENT_SECTOR_IS_SAFE:   
00645                   gubFact[FACT_CURRENT_SECTOR_IS_SAFE] = !( ( (gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector && NPCHeardShot( ubProfileID ) ) || gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) );
00646                   break;
00647             case FACT_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_IN_TRANSIT:
00648             case FACT_NEW_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_WAITING:
00649                   if ( gubFact[FACT_PABLO_PUNISHED_BY_PLAYER] == TRUE && gubFact[FACT_PABLO_RETURNED_GOODS] == FALSE && gMercProfiles[ PABLO ].bMercStatus != MERC_IS_DEAD )
00650                   {
00651                         gubFact[FACT_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_IN_TRANSIT] = FALSE;
00652                         gubFact[FACT_NEW_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_WAITING] = FALSE;
00653                   }
00654                   else
00655                   {
00656                         if (CheckForNewShipment()) // if new stuff waiting unseen in Drassen
00657                         {
00658                               gubFact[FACT_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_IN_TRANSIT] = FALSE;
00659                               gubFact[FACT_NEW_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_WAITING] = TRUE;
00660                         }
00661                         else if ( CountNumberOfBobbyPurchasesThatAreInTransit() > 0) // if stuff in transit
00662                         {
00663                               if ( gubFact[ FACT_PACKAGE_DAMAGED ] == TRUE )
00664                               {
00665                                     gubFact[FACT_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_IN_TRANSIT] = FALSE;
00666                               }
00667                               else
00668                               {
00669                                     gubFact[FACT_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_IN_TRANSIT] = TRUE;
00670                               }
00671                               gubFact[FACT_NEW_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_WAITING] = FALSE;
00672                         }
00673                         else
00674                         {
00675                               gubFact[FACT_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_IN_TRANSIT] = FALSE;
00676                               gubFact[FACT_NEW_BOBBYRAY_SHIPMENT_WAITING] = FALSE;
00677                         }
00678                   }
00679                   break;
00680             case FACT_NPC_WOUNDED:
00681                   gubFact[FACT_NPC_WOUNDED] = CheckNPCWounded( ubProfileID, FALSE );
00682                   break;
00683             case FACT_NPC_WOUNDED_BY_PLAYER:

01169                   break;

01234 
01235 void StartQuest( UINT8 ubQuest, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
01236 {
01237   InternalStartQuest( ubQuest, sSectorX, sSectorY, TRUE );
01238 }
01239 
01240 
01241 void InternalStartQuest( UINT8 ubQuest, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, BOOLEAN fUpdateHistory )
01242 {
01243       if ( gubQuest[ubQuest ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01244       {
01245             gubQuest[ubQuest] = QUESTINPROGRESS;
01246 
01247     if ( fUpdateHistory )
01248     {
01249               SetHistoryFact( HISTORY_QUEST_STARTED, ubQuest, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01250     }
01251       }
01252       else
01253       {
01254             gubQuest[ubQuest] = QUESTINPROGRESS;
01255       }
01256 }
01257 
01258 void EndQuest( UINT8 ubQuest, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
01259 {
01260   InternalEndQuest( ubQuest, sSectorX, sSectorY, TRUE );
01261 }
01262 
01263 void InternalEndQuest( UINT8 ubQuest, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, BOOLEAN fUpdateHistory )
01264 {
01265       if ( gubQuest[ubQuest ] == QUESTINPROGRESS )
01266       {
01267             gubQuest[ubQuest] = QUESTDONE;
01268 
01269     if ( fUpdateHistory )
01270     {
01271               ResetHistoryFact( ubQuest, sSectorX, sSectorY );
01272     }
01273       }
01274       else
01275       {
01276             gubQuest[ubQuest] = QUESTDONE;
01277       }
01278 
01279       if ( ubQuest == QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA )
01280       {
01281             // cheap hack to try to prevent Madame Layla from thinking that you are
01282             // still in the brothel with Maria...
01283             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData = 0;
01284             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData2 = 0;
01285       }
01286       
01287 };
01288 
01289 void InitQuestEngine()
01290 {
01291       memset(gubQuest, 0, sizeof(gubQuest));
01292       memset(gubFact,  0, sizeof(gubFact));
01293 
01294       // semi-hack to make the letter quest start right away
01295       CheckForQuests( 1 );
01296 
01297       if ( gGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI )
01298       {
01299             // 3 medical boosters
01300             gubCambriaMedicalObjects = 21;
01301       }
01302       else
01303       {
01304             gubCambriaMedicalObjects = 18;
01305       }
01306 
01307       gubBoxingMatchesWon = 0;
01308       gubBoxersRests = 0;
01309       gfBoxersResting = FALSE;
01310 }

01313 
01314 void CheckForQuests( UINT32 uiDay )
01315 {
01316       // This function gets called at 8:00 AM time of the day
01317 
01318 #ifdef TESTQUESTS
01319       ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"Checking For Quests, Day %d", uiDay );
01320 #endif
01321 
01322   // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01323       // QUEST 0 : DELIVER LETTER
01324       // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01325       // The game always starts with DELIVER LETTER quest, so turn it on if it hasn't
01326       // already started
01327       if (gubQuest[QUEST_DELIVER_LETTER] == QUESTNOTSTARTED)
01328       {
01329             StartQuest( QUEST_DELIVER_LETTER, -1, -1 );
01330 #ifdef TESTQUESTS
01331             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"Started DELIVER LETTER quest");
01332 #endif
01333       }
01334       
01335       // This quest gets turned OFF through conversation with Miguel - when user hands
01336       // Miguel the letter
01337 }

01339 
01340 BOOLEAN SaveQuestInfoToSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
01341 {
01342       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
01343 
01344       //Save all the states if the Quests
01345       FileWrite( hFile, gubQuest, MAX_QUESTS, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01346       if( uiNumBytesWritten != MAX_QUESTS )
01347       {
01348             return(FALSE);
01349       }
01350 
01351       //Save all the states for the facts
01352       FileWrite( hFile, gubFact, NUM_FACTS, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01353       if( uiNumBytesWritten != NUM_FACTS )
01354       {
01355             return(FALSE);
01356       }
01357 
01358 
01359       return( TRUE );
01360 }
01361 
01362 
01363 BOOLEAN LoadQuestInfoFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
01364 {
01365       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
01366 
01367       //Save all the states if the Quests
01368       FileRead( hFile, gubQuest, MAX_QUESTS, &uiNumBytesRead );
01369       if( uiNumBytesRead != MAX_QUESTS )
01370       {
01371             return(FALSE);
01372       }
01373 
01374       //Save all the states for the facts
01375       FileRead( hFile, gubFact, NUM_FACTS, &uiNumBytesRead );
01376       if( uiNumBytesRead != NUM_FACTS )
01377       {
01378             return(FALSE);
01379       }
01380 
01381       return( TRUE );
01382 }
